sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"小说，故事"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: novel, romance, fiction, story, fable, tale
means: novel ： 指任何有情节、人物、对白，虚构的长篇散文体故事。
romance系novel早期的代用词，泛指具有强烈神话和传奇色彩的故事，现指爱情故事。
fiction ： 指部分或全部虚构的短篇、中篇、长篇小说，也指传奇故事，是小说的总称。
story ： 指篇幅较短，常包含一系列情节或事件，口述或书写成文的故事。
fable ： 指短小而寓有教育意义的虚构故事。故事的主人公多为拟人化的动物或非动物之类。也作传说解。
tale常可与story换用，指以事实为中心作叙述的故事，也指古代流传下来的传说故事或神话故事。

means.word_mean: 故事; 传说; 小说

sentences.en: He likes to listen to fairy stories.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢听神话故事。

means.word_mean: (新闻)报道; 新闻报道的题材

sentences.en: That story has got into the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 那件事已见报了。

means.word_mean: 〈口〉谎话

sentences.en: The teacher told him off for telling stories.
sentences.cn: 老师责备他说谎。

means.word_mean: 情节
〈美〉楼层

sentences.en: They live in three storys building.
sentences.cn: 他们住在一幢三层楼的公寓里。

means.word_mean: （真实情况的）叙述，描述
逸事，趣闻；传闻
背景情况；真情；情况；详情
来历，经历
同楼层的房间
(门面墙壁等的)建筑水平层次
(任何结构、构造的)层，分层[英国英语亦作 storey]
用历史故事画装饰
说谎

sentences.en: Don't story to me!
sentences.cn: 别对我说谎! </seg>

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used after raising a matter to indicate that one does not want to expand on it for now
(informal)used to emphasize that there is nothing to add on a matter just mentioned
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)就是这个样子，仅此而已

lj.lj_ly: Men don't cry in public. End of story.
lj.lj_ls: 男人不会在公共场合哭泣。就是这样。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to indicate that, for now, one does not want to talk about something that is too painful and involved

phrase.cizu_name: it's (或 that's) the story of one's life

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to lament the fact that a particular misfortune has happened too often in one's experience
used to indicate that a particular bad situation is tediously familiar

lj.lj_ly: United kept on trying but it was the same old sotry—no luck.
lj.lj_ls: 虽然联队一直在努力，但还是老样子，运气不佳。

lj.lj_ly: &B{the story goes that} he's fallen out with his friends.
lj.lj_ls: 据说他跟他的朋友们闹翻了。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to end an account of events quickly

lj.lj_ly: to cut a long story short, I married Stephen.
lj.lj_ls: 长话短说，我和斯蒂芬结婚了。

entry.def: A story is a description of imaginary people and events, which is written or told in order to entertain.

example.ex: The second story in the book is titled 'The Scholar'...
example.tran: 书中的第二个故事题为《学者》。

example.ex: I shall tell you a story about four little rabbits.
example.tran: 我要给你讲一个 4 只小兔子的故事。

entry.def: A story is a description of an event or something that happened to someone, especially a spoken description of it.

example.ex: The parents all shared interesting stories about their children...
example.tran: 父母之间都会分享自己孩子的一些趣事。

example.ex: Isak's story is typical of a child who has a specific learning disability.
example.tran: 伊萨克的故事就是一个具有某种学习障碍的孩子的典型故事。

entry.def: The story of something is a description of all the important things that have happened to it since it began.

example.ex: ...the story of the women's movement in Ireland.
example.tran: 爱尔兰妇女运动的记载

entry.def: If someone invents a story, they give a false explanation or account of something.

example.ex: He invented some story about a cousin.
example.tran: 他骗别人说自己有位堂兄。

entry.def: A news story is a piece of news in a newspaper or in a news broadcast.

example.ex: Those are some of the top stories in the news...
example.tran: 那些是报纸上的头条新闻。

example.ex: They'll do anything for a story.
example.tran: 他们为抢到新闻会不择手段。

entry.def: You say 'but that's another story' when you have mentioned a subject that you are not going to talk about or explain in detail.
entry.tran: 但那是另一回事了;那就不相干了

example.ex: I'd met him at a dance I'd gone to on my own. But that's another story.
example.tran: 我有一次独自去参加舞会时遇上了他。但那是题外话了。

entry.def: In British English, you use to cut a long story short to indicate that you are going to state the final result of an event and not give any more details. In American English, you say to make a long story short .

example.ex: To cut a long story short, I ended up as managing director.
example.tran: 长话短说，我最终当上了总经理。

entry.def: You use a different story to refer to a situation, usually a bad one, which exists in one set of circumstances when you have mentioned that it does not exist in another set of circumstances.
entry.tran: 另一回事，不同情况(通常指不好的一面)

example.ex: Where Marcella lives, the rents are fairly cheap, but a little further north it's a different story.
example.tran: 玛塞拉居住的地方，租金比较便宜，但稍稍再往北一点情况就不同了。

entry.def: If you say it's the same old story or it's the old story, you mean that something unpleasant or undesirable seems to happen again and again.
entry.tran: 又来了，又是老一套(表示不好的事情似乎总是重复发生)

example.ex: It's the same old story. They want one person to do three people's jobs.
example.tran: 又是老一套。他们想让 1 个人做 3 个人的工作。

entry.def: If you say that something is only part of the story or is not the whole story, you mean that the explanation or information given is not enough for a situation to be fully understood.
entry.tran: 不是事情的全部;只是部分情况

example.ex: This may be true but it is only part of the story...
example.tran: 这可能是真的，但它并不是事情的全部。

example.ex: Jane goes to great lengths to explain that this is not the whole story.
example.tran: 简竭力地解释说那不是事情的全貌。

entry.def: If someone tells you their side of the story, they tell you why they behaved in a particular way and why they think they were right, when other people think that person behaved wrongly.

example.ex: He had already made up his mind before even hearing her side of the story.
example.tran: 他没等听到她的解释就已经作出了决定。

means.word_mean: 1. a message that tells the particulars of an act or occurrence or course of events; presented in writing or drama or cinema or as a radio or television program;

sentences.sentence: "Disney's stories entertain adults as well as children"

means.word_mean: 2. a piece of fiction that narrates a chain of related events;
3. structure consisting of a room or set of rooms comprising a single level of a multilevel building;
4. a record or narrative description of past events;

sentences.sentence: "he gave an inaccurate account of the plot to kill the president"

means.word_mean: 5. a short account of the news;

sentences.sentence: "the story was on the 11 o'clock news"
"the account of his speech that was given on the evening news made the governor furious"

means.word_mean: 6. a trivial lie;

sentences.sentence: "he told a fib about eating his spinach"
"how can I stop my child from telling stories?"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a historical account or representation): shortening of Anglo-Norman French estorie, from Latin historia (see history)

sentences.cn: 布鲁克斯女士可能会也可能不会对她的记者是如何得到新闻故事的有所怀疑,但是她没有质疑、不做指示,也没有得到可追踪、有记录的答案。
sentences.en: Ms Brooks may or may not have had suspicions about how her journalists got their stories, but she asked no questions, gave no instructions—nor received traceable, recorded answers.

sentences.cn: 带着特有的自信心，狄更斯坚持要求西摩为他自己的故事配图。
sentences.en: With characteristic confidence, Dickens successfully insisted that Seymour's pictures illustrate his own story instead.

sentences.cn: 随着时间的流逝，这些体验通常会变得更加珍贵——以记忆或故事的形式——尤 其是当它们让人感觉到自己与他人联系更紧密时。
sentences.en: These purchases often become more valuable with time — as stories or memories — particularly if they involve feeling more connected to others.

sentences.cn: 当有新闻来的时候他们将之写成新闻故事。
sentences.en: They are the people who write the news stories as they come in.

sentences.cn: 当新闻故事经过多人之手后，会被修改润色理顺，然后才到我手里。
sentences.en: The stories are then passed to the senior duty editor and the assistant editor.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 我在播报前可以浏览大部分的新闻故事。
sentences.en: As stories go through the chains of people, they are refined, corrected and sorted out until they come finally to me and?I have a chance to read through most stories before I go on the air.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 今天，我想以一个自己生活中的故事为开端，这一故事突出了今天我们聚在这里的人共同关注的问题。
sentences.en: Today, I’d like to preface my remarks with a story from my own life which I feel highlights the common concerns that bring us here together.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 关于大学，我们能从讲话者的故事中了解到什么？。

sentences.cn: 我总爱说起的故事之一发生在我在哈佛大学有幸教授的一堂大一研讨课上，当时我是哈佛大学的校长。
sentences.en: One of the stories I always like to tell is of a freshman seminar that I had a chance to teach at Harvard when I was president of the university

sentences.en: After all, we sometimes understand ourselves best while listening to a story about another person.

sentences.cn: 对这个故事, 我们不能简单地当成传说来看待.

sentences.en: The stories I had heard were coming back in disconcerting detail.

sentences.cn: 格言 、 谚语 、 民歌 、 笑话、传说 、 故事,琳琅满目.

sentences.en: Later, in the town, I must have heard other fragments of the old woman's story.

sentences.en: Incidentally, that story about the big convoy from Francisco is horse manure to bolster civilian morale.

sentences.en: The story of Orpheus has furnished Pope with an illustration ( Thomas Bulfinch )

sentences.en: There are stories of early African voyages to America.

sentences.cn: 为数不多的真实故事已经变成了不朽的圣诞传说.
sentences.en: A few true stories have become enduring Christmas tales themselves.

sentences.cn: 同样,关于摩西和参孙的传说在苏美尔和巴比伦也有相似的版本.
sentences.en: So too the stories of Moses and of Samson have Sumerian and Babylonian parallels.

sentences.cn: 关于这五个充满活力的大字,民间有不少动人的传说.
sentences.en: There are many stories about the origin of the five colossal characters.

sentences.en: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow is an old short story by Washington Irving.

sentences.cn: 关于元宵节的起源有多种传说.
sentences.en: There are many stories about how the Lantern Festival started.

sentences.cn: 传说如此.
sentences.en: So the story goes.

sentences.cn: 罗宾汉的故事主要是根据传说写成的.
sentences.en: The stories of Robin Hood are based mainly on traditions.

sentences.cn: 红字的故事渐渐变成了传说.
sentences.en: The story of the scarlet letter grew into a legend.

sentences.cn: 尼斯湖怪兽的传说吸引了很多游客来到这个地区.
sentences.en: The Story of the Loch Ness Monster has attracted many tourists to the area.

sentences.cn: 因而历史应该是人民大众的历史，是记录他们斗争的历史。
sentences.en: And history should be the story of the masses and their record of struggle.

sentences.cn: 她将看到在古老历史和现代记载中一切著名的东西.
sentences.en: She will see whatever is famous in old story and in modern record.

sentences.cn: 就我所知, 这所大学的历史是从1209年开始的.
sentences.en: The story of the university began, as far as I know, in 1209.

sentences.cn: 津巴布韦不是非洲历史“尘封”的最为糟糕的一页.
sentences.en: Zimbabwe is hardly the worst story from Africa.

sentences.cn: 化学实验会告诉我们在过去的时间内,水是如何存在于行星上的历史过程.
sentences.en: Chemicals tests will tell a story of how water has existed on the planet over time.

sentences.cn: 英语的历史开始在公元400年后的某个时间.
sentences.en: The story of the English language begins some time after the year A.

sentences.cn: 这是一部新世界的发展史,是一部后浪推前浪的历史.
sentences.en: It is the story of a new world that became a friend and liberator of the old.

sentences.cn: 这是一部描写十七世纪加勒比海海盗的历史小说.
sentences.en: It was a historical story about a 17 th century Caribbean pirate.

sentences.cn: 安泽火腿应该是源自金华火腿, 说起来还有一段历史故事呢.
sentences.en: Anze from Jinhua ham is ham, say there is still a historical story.

sentences.cn: 经济学家谋略解析这一长长历史中的各个部分是如何被联系在一起的.
sentences.en: Economists try to understand how all the parts of the long story are related.

sentences.cn: 当然, 我国的历史也并非没有困难的篇章.
sentences.en: Of course, the story of our nation is not without its difficult chapters.

sentences.cn: 这段研究历史曲折、丰富,堪称生物医学研究领域中的生动案例.
sentences.en: The fruitful and flexuous process deserved to be called a vivid story in biomedical research field.

sentences.cn: 它们的历史还仅仅是开始.
sentences.en: Their story has hardly begun.

sentences.cn: 我喜欢看历史故事,因为这样可以知道过去人们的生活.
sentences.en: I like reading historical stories because I can learn about the lives that people led long ago.

sentences.cn: 常常是极棒的故事大王的教授们把演讲课变成了美妙的历史戏剧.
sentences.en: Often superb story tellers, they turn lecturessintosgrand historical drama.

sentences.cn: 乌龟大师: 昨天已成为历史, 明天还是未知数, 今天则是一份礼品.
sentences.en: Oogway: Yesterday is hello story, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift.

sentences.cn: 这个故事只是浑说而已, 没有历史考究.
sentences.en: This story is just made up, there is no historical evidence.

sentences.cn: 这个故事是以历史事实为根据的.
sentences.en: The story is based on historical facts.

sentences.cn: 历史告诉我们,巨大成功的背后都有着无数的失败.
sentences.en: History informs us that stories of success are also stories of great failures.

sentences.cn: 我们的主要任务毕竟应该在叙述多数派的历史.
sentences.en: The main task, after all, must be to trace the story of the majority.

sentences.cn: 我的内情尚待弄明.
sentences.en: My story is still being unraveled.

sentences.cn: 他是少数几个知道内情的人之一.
sentences.en: He is one of the few who knows the story.

sentences.cn: 有些没让参加那次会议的记者把内情捅出去了.
sentences.en: Some reporters who not included in the session broke the story.

sentences.cn: 仔细听他讲, 他似乎知道全部内情.
sentences.en: Lend an ear to him. It'seems that he knows the whole story.

sentences.cn: 就他一个人知道这事的内情.
sentences.en: He alone knows the inside story.

sentences.cn: 来把杰克和玛丽两人关系的内情给我这位朋友讲一遍, 他想听听每一个细节.
sentences.en: Come and retail the story of Jack's relationship with Mary to my friend here; he wants to hear every detail.

sentences.cn: 事件过后这么多年方获知当时的内情，这实在是令人慨叹。
sentences.en: It's fascinating to get the inside story so many years after this incident.

sentences.cn: 这本传记是一则并未完成的故事,这场与生命心动邂逅的传奇还要不断延续下去.
sentences.en: Naturalist is an unfinished story and increasingly thoughtful love affair with life itself: all life.

sentences.cn: 早期的传记作家常不惜弄虚作假,编造出一两个与英雄人物有关的美妙故事来.
sentences.en: Early biographers didn't hesitate to make up an admirable story or two about their hero.

sentences.cn: 所以传记片讲的是人的生平事迹.
sentences.en: So it's telling the story of their lifes.

sentences.cn: 他读了林肯的传记后,能讲出许多关于这位总统的故事.
sentences.en: After reading a biography of Lincoln he was able to tell many stories about the President.

sentences.cn: 第一个撰写牛顿传记的作家声称他是从牛顿本人口中听到这个故事的.
sentences.en: Newton's first biographer claimed he heard the story from the man himself.

sentences.cn: 现代传记作家不胡编这样的故事.
sentences.en: Modern biographers do not invent such stories.

sentences.cn: 他所讲的故事说明了她处理这个问题的技巧.
sentences.en: His story illustrates her skill in dealing with the problem.

sentences.cn: 你讲的故事缺乏生动性和变化.
sentences.en: Your telling of the story lacks vividness and variety.

sentences.cn: 我仍记得奶奶常给我讲的故事.
sentences.en: I still remember the story which Grandma often told me.

sentences.cn: 你给我讲的故事使我想起了另一个故事.
sentences.en: Your telling me that story reminds me of another.

sentences.cn: 黛家人给我讲的故事还不只是关于战时的英勇.
sentences.en: The stories told to me by the Days involve more than wartime valor.

sentences.cn: 我们对他讲的故事感到厌倦.
sentences.en: We are bored with his story.

sentences.cn: 问题是, 所有的人对我讲的故事根本就不相信.
sentences.en: Trouble is, nobody believe a single word of my story.

sentences.cn: 旅行者讲的故事使我们非常激动.
sentences.en: The trave 11 er thrilled us with his story.

sentences.cn: 听了他讲的故事,我几乎笑破肚皮.
sentences.en: I almost split my sides at his stories.

sentences.cn: 不要瞧不起那位老人所讲的故事,他去过的国家比你吃的热气腾腾的晚餐还要多.
sentences.en: Don't scorn the old man's stories: he has visited more countries than you've had hot dinners.

sentences.cn: 祖母讲的故事使我非常害怕.
sentences.en: The story told by grandma scared me out of my wits.

sentences.cn: 让我给你讲一个你姥爷给我讲的故事吧.
sentences.en: Let me tell you a story that your grandfather told me.

sentences.cn: 你讲的故事在我听来十分荒诞.
sentences.en: Your story sounds to me just like a fish story.

sentences.cn: 人们常常嘲笑海员所讲的故事.
sentences.en: People have often laughed at stories told by seamen.

sentences.cn: 我们时常想起你给我们讲的故事.
sentences.en: We have often laughed over the story you had told us.

sentences.cn: 直到现在, 我还不时回忆起我妈妈多年前讲的故事.
sentences.en: Till now, stories that my mother told me years ago can sometimes come to me.

sentences.cn: 你讲的故事使我想起我从前的一段经历.
sentences.en: That story you told reminded me of an experience I once had.

sentences.cn: 孩子们恳求她给他们念一段上床时讲的故事.
sentences.en: The children begged her to read them a bedtime story.

sentences.cn: 他讲的故事非常恐怖,使我毛骨悚然.
sentences.en: The story he told was so terrified that it gave me the shivers.

sentences.cn: 我母亲好些年前讲的故事我都回想得起来.
sentences.en: I can recall stories that my mother told me years ago.

sentences.cn: 她讲的故事比你讲的有趣多了.
sentences.en: The story she tell is more interesting than that you tell.

sentences.cn: 显然他讲的故事听起来似曾相识.
sentences.en: Certainly the story he tells has a familiar ring to it.

sentences.cn: 这里他所讲的故事主要是美洲的风情.
sentences.en: The story that he tells here chiefly is the amorous feelings of America.

sentences.cn: 她所讲的故事伤了他的心.
sentences.en: The story she told broke his heart.

sentences.cn: 他讲的故事很使人发笑.
sentences.en: He is an amusing story teller.

sentences.cn: 我们走开了, 他讲的故事也就结束了.
sentences.en: As we walked away, he wound up his story.

sentences.cn: 我讲的故事你感兴趣 吗 ?
sentences.en: Does my story intrigue you?

sentences.cn: 她讲的故事比我讲的更有趣.
sentences.en: The story that she tells is more interesting than what I speak.

sentences.cn: 他把我讲的故事加以改进,讲出一个更好的故事.
sentences.en: He capped my story by telling a better one.

sentences.cn: 你给我讲的故事是我听到过的最有趣的幽默故事.
sentences.en: I've never heard a more interesting humorous story than that you told me.

sentences.cn: 她知道这孩子又在说谎了。
sentences.en: She knew the child had been telling stories again.

sentences.cn: 别相信他的话, 他是在说谎.
sentences.en: Don't believe what he says; he's only telling a story.

sentences.cn: 说谎是一种可耻的破坏信誉的行为.
sentences.en: Telling the story was a flagrant breach of trust.

sentences.cn: 报纸上的这条新闻很快就被白宫“说谎机器“ ( 白宫宣传机构 ) 编造淹没了.
sentences.en: The newspaper story was quickly overrun by House spin machine [ public relations team ].

sentences.cn: 报纸上的这条新闻很快就被白宫“说谎机器“ ( 即白宫宣传机构 ) 的编造淹没了.
sentences.en: The newspaper story was quickly overrun by the White House spin machine [ public relations team ].

sentences.cn: 不要相信那个家伙; 他说谎话.
sentences.en: Don't trust that man; he tells stories.

sentences.cn: 他一定在说谎, 他的说法不合情理.
sentences.en: He must be lying. His story doesn't add up.

sentences.cn: 老师责备他说谎.
sentences.en: The teacher told him off for telling stories.

sentences.cn: 不久,他就成了孤家寡人, 尽管他付诸努力,甚至用说谎来活跃他的故事也无济于事.
sentences.en: Soon he was alone, despite his efforts and the lies he told to enliven his story.

sentences.cn: 整件事是说谎加上欺骗的混杂.
sentences.en: The whole story was a farrago of lies and deceit.

sentences.cn: 纸上的这条新闻很快就被白宫“说谎机器“ ( 即白宫宣传机构 ) 的编造淹没了.
sentences.en: The newspaper story was quickly overrun by the House spin machine [ public relations team ].

sentences.cn: 他在这个故事上说谎说得太过分了.
sentences.en: He was laying on the story a bit thick.

sentences.cn: 约翰说谎是常有的事.
sentences.en: That John told a lie is an old story.

sentences.cn: 他父母教导他不能说谎.
sentences.en: His parents told him not to tell stories.

Sentence.sentence: The tests are designed to detect subtle ( ' ,  细微的) changes in mental function, and involve solving puzzles, recalling words and details from stories, and identifying patterns in collections of letters and symbols.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: You may have heard some of the fashion industry horror stories: models eating tissues or cotton balls to hold off hunger, and models collapsing from hunger-induced heart attacks just seconds after they step off the runway.

Sentence.sentence: We can cultivate a growth mind-set in children by telling success stories that emphasize hard work and love of learning.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: How do we transmit a growth mind-set to our children? One way is by telling stories about achievements that result from hard work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A friend told me the following story.

Sentence.sentence: And she makes a little extra money by sending stories to newspapers in the States.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: By writing stories for American newspapers
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Anyway, there is a little more to tell, but I don't want to ruin the story for you.

Sentence.sentence: Mysteries and detective stories came second on the list at 53%.

Sentence.sentence: I really like these old episodes of "The Twilight Zone" because the stories are fascinating.

Sentence.sentence: She is fond of telling stories in her speech
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A new sign in the window told the story.

Sentence.sentence: A Moon Express representative declined to comment on the story, but noted that the company is very optimistic about its proposal.

Sentence.sentence: A well-known, but inaccurate, story about Julia Child may have contributed to this food myth.

Sentence.sentence: Anna Gomez leads in an exciting production of the great Spanish love story, Carmen.
